item.title: Judge slams Delphi convicted killer at sentencing
item.description: Convicted Delphi, Indiana, killer Richard Allen was sentenced on Friday to 130 years in prison for the 2017 murders of two teenage girls.

item.title: Government shutdown live updates: Republicans to weigh Johnson's new spending plan
item.description: The federal government is set to run out of money Friday night.

item.title: Air travel, mail delivery, national parks: What are possible shutdown impacts?
item.description: Based on past government estimates, some 3.5 million federal workers could go without paychecks this holiday season until an agreement is passed.

item.title: LIVE: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events

item.title: WATCH: 3rd grader caught on camera saving choking student
item.description: Thomas Conley, 8, jumped into action when he noticed his classmate was choking in their school cafeteria.
